Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Reroute at Roosevelt/Independence
ShortDescription: 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Pulaski, 16th, Central Park and Roosevelt due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Independence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Roosevelt, Pulaski, 16th, Central Park and Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Independence.

Allow extra travel time.
